title: Cat-Litter Rivals Pounce on New Shipping Strategies
text:
In the cat-litter arms race, feline commodes have become fresher, less dusty and easier to clean. Now big litter makers are chasing a new goal: moving their product more cheaply.

Clorox Co., the No. 2 U.S. litter maker, with brands including Fresh Step and Scoop Away, plans to build an East Coast factory to cut costs of transporting litter as the company struggles to compete with faster-growing rivals.
